name: World of Warships: Legends — Camo Cache
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Camo Cache
description:
You've found a Cache that's chock-full of Camouflage! Add a ton of Camos with some Premium Account time and Commander XP to your Port.

This bundle includes: - 3 days of Premium Account - 10x Type 4 Camos - 10x Type 3 Camos - 10x Type 2 Camos - 10x Type 1 Camos - 10x Hunter Camos - 37,000 Commander XP

Some content, including Boosters, Commander XP, Camouflages, etc., is only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
